it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class EffectsLambda

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.model.EffectsLambda

  • public class EffectsLambda
extends java.lang.Object
    Class containing the static methods that are used to change the status of a player when they are targeted by an enemy action

      • move

        public static PlayerLambda move(Player pl,
                                Point newPosition,
                                Map map)
        Move the player by changing its position and the position of its pawn in the map
        Parameters:
        pl - Player that has to be moved
        newPosition - Position where to move
        map - Map in which the reference of the player has to be moved
        Returns:
        the lambda that has to be run from the player who receive the action
